div.p:
Welcome to the REF Compliance Checker Demonstrator repository. In this repository you can test tools created to assist institutions to comply with the
audit requirements for Open access in the post-2014 Research Excellence Framework (REF) .
This installation of DSpace 5.6 has been enhanced with the Atmire RIOXX patch and a number of new developments including:

list.item: REF specific metadata: Date of First Compliant Deposit (FCD), Version of FCD, Date of First compliant Open Access (FOA) and REF target panel.
REF accepted exceptions, including technical exceptions, access exceptions, deposit exceptions and other exceptions.
